Text: Share Your Thoughts With UsDear Peter Wed like to invite you to join other Travelocity members in sharing your plans and thoughts on traveling for this Winter Holiday Season Tell us whats on your mind by completing this quick member poll The results of this poll will be available in our next issue of Real Deals Click Here surveysplsHhtml Your survey responses will be used only for evaluation purposes We will not use your information in any way to market to you directly Thank you for your participation Sincerely The Travelocitycom Team Unsubscribe Occasionally we use email to communicate special offers to our members If you prefer not to receive these please visit the following link and click the Continue button promoptoutctlemail NRONCOM Password LookUp Follow this link and well help you retrieve your password lognpwdformctl If you have any other questions simply reply to this email with the original message attached and ask our Customer Service Center
